Reviews.Title: “Would definitely use again!”
Reviews.Author: vrtw
Reviews.Content: husband visiting venice birthday happy choice hotel location excellent 5 minutes rialto bridge convenient coming water bus 5 minutes san marco square direction check check smoothly enquiries posed staff handled quickly courteously deluxe canal facing canal spacious bathroom liked extra bedding pillows provided normally request hotels beds iron night reception arranged dress ironed cost â‚¬8 iron home travel wrinkle free clothes booked speacial romantic arrangement included breakfast bed prosecco tickets worth itwe spent enjoyable evening casino tickets am 100 effort 1 morning breakfast bed collected 10 minutes waiting looked outside realized called reception immediately sent breakfast quickly hotel responds goes wrong alot water drinkable advise getting water brushing teeth etc outside hotel paid â‚¬5 750ml te hotel â‚¬150 15l normal shop definitely hotel pleasure visit venice

Reviews.Title: “excellent location”
Reviews.Author: kiki b
Reviews.Content: wonderful time venice contributed hotel excellent location beautiful real value breakfast hotel star missing cold twice heat little insignificant detail else thank bella venezia

Reviews.Title: “bella bella!”
Reviews.Author: richieblue1
Reviews.Content: booked hotel annexe scala review hidden gem scala hotel moved scala spent time hotel cant praise true 4 star hotel reception staff helpful excellent reception bar crowning glory breakfast bacon fluffy scrambled egg toast cereals hot croissants fresh fruit juices tea coffee cakes pastries yoghurts plus table view canal cant comment annexe looked lovely hotel 2 mins rialto 5 mins st marks square perfect passing lovely shops views

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Quiet and Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: cdnlindaloo
Reviews.Content: hotel excellent location directly water taxi basically straight st marks square bright clean elevator perfectly adequate breakfast included delicious pizza narrow street entrance lots reasonably priced shops route st marks square clean quiet comfortable

Reviews.Title: “A very good experience at this hotel and it is in a good location too.”
Reviews.Author: CameronTwells
Reviews.Content: booked prepaid standard superior upgrade arrival city hotel bathroom clean tidy view hotel quiet aircon breakfast pastries coffee machine tasted chemicals negative overall found bella venezia comfortable staff pleasant

Reviews.Title: “Bait and Switch”
Reviews.Author: Labird057
Reviews.Content: horrible stay staff rude waiting check parties ahead complaining sold assured dishonest hotel sold deluxe pre paid standard view wall avoid hotel costs using location city suck money staff dishonest honor

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel .... but”
Reviews.Author: LadyWard1
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel clean appointed beds comfortable breakfast fab booked website advertising romantic venice break unbeatable price superior bottle wine arrival breakfast free entry casino arrival greeted miserable male receptionist huffed puffed checked fine discover deluxe wine arrival offer breakfast moan complain fine holiday complained venice hotel situated try italian restaurant 3 doors recommend hotel due location cleanliness nice furnishings front house desk people women lessons friendly costs smile advertise deliver

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Hotel”
Reviews.Author: laura_luna1223
Reviews.Content: husband spent 3 days trip italy hotel beautifuly furnished clean bed confortable matress slept staff friendly helpful people reception desk advice tips time location hotel close main rialto piazza san marco breakfast choice recommend hotel anytime

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Venetian week-end”
Reviews.Author: Tiennetti
Reviews.Content: ive bella venezia romantic weekend package including 2 nights champane bottle hotel situated clean channel nice wood bricks top staff time willing help breakfast astonishing served 15minutes lot variety italian pastry products change orange juice natural recomended

Reviews.Title: “Great value and an upgrade.”
Reviews.Author: NikEdinburgh
Reviews.Content: wife stayed bella venezia leg italian tour slightly concerned told arrival upgraded luxury apartment situated corner fears soon rest apartment consisted double bedrooms living flat screen tv bathroom tastefully decorated standard air con throughout addition unlimited laptop apartment overlooked courtyard quiet night location hotel apartment ideal exploring close sights reception staff helpful dealt minor quickly efficiently breakfast bright overlooking canal served friendly welcoming staff bella experience added greatly venice stay welcome haven busy streets city

Reviews.Title: “great little hotel”
Reviews.Author: 1girlintheworld
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend summer bella venezia directions reviews accurate stop water bus mind rialto stop main hotel decent size furnishings condition neat clean breakfast adequate exactly european hotels pastries yogurt cold cuts etc addition eggs housemade chocolate croissants served warm nice treat staff person front desk time mean waiting question complaint complaint suggestion accommodate guests location close rialto water bus stop highly recommend value affordable price

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Venezia!”
Reviews.Author: SheilaHnSeattle
Reviews.Content: hotel lovely sophisticated lovely air conditioning staff helpful friendly oasis return perfect day walking exploring venice hotel situated easy rialto san marcos traveled venice signs truly guaranteed nice hotel located wander afield getting lost fun figure hotel serves nice breakfast morning nice start day definitely return hotel venice hope soon

Reviews.Content: venice notoriously expensive accustomed 5 london west accommodation suspect poor value tolerated sake location beautiful city reception staff looked told behalf manager sign satisfied accommodation sign didnt 1 booked lastminute hotel provided discount vast arrival suite floor building 100 metres access door obtained passerby unlocked front door building entry permanently security door hotel broken didnt fix accommodation insecure reaching flight stairs public staff potentially dangerous women travellers 2 suite beautifully furnished decorated attracted numerous mosquitoes windows closed hotel device plug socket reduce wasnt saved trouble hunting night bitten hours 3 breakfast previous reviewer warned mediocre particularly cheap touches included taking fresh orange juice machine providing lowest quality fare 4 told illegal iron hotel 20 euros iron dress else believe ironing own clothes criminal offence 5 alternative shown cramped stuffy third floor minutes reception staff falsely insisted fire closed declined worse alternative staff insisted option refused change mind minutes superior shouted allowing accept third floor tried unsuccessfully insist am lifelong fan seen stage fraction price paid moral beautiful sleepy venice mosquito repellent enjoyable days dont stay unless paid else care value service quality

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, quiet and clean”
Reviews.Author: missemmz
Reviews.Content: stayed bella venezia beginning april visit venice read hotel reviews described hotel perfect location minutes rialto bridge st marks square fair size didnt view inside wall shutters windows black curtains meant nights sleep american breakfast consisted cheese ham toast croissants scrambled eggs frankfurt sausage fruit yoghurt wasnt bad dont expecting cooked breakfast cause dissappointed reception staff staff venice rude expressionless didnt check allowed leave apart location search deal rate

Reviews.Title: “great stay”

Reviews.Content: 4 star hotel usually clean cleaned 2 times day breakfast bit crowded pretty view canal staff friendly location weekend pack value
